thread.title: EzAccounting 2015 Software Now Being Offered At a $30 Discount For a Limited Time
thread.title_full: EzAccounting 2015 Business Software Now Being Offered At a $30 Discount For a Limited Time

author: Tammie Bernard
title: EzAccounting 2015 Software Now Being Offered At a $30 Discount For a Limited Time
text:
Companies that are new to processing payroll and accounting tasks in-house are ecstatic about the latest promotion of ezAccounting 2015 from Halfpricesoft.com. New business owners can now acquire ezAccounting at a $30 discounted price for a limited time. With the innovative interface and the low cost on this 2015 version, customers with little to no accounting background can begin processing tasks immediately. “New promotion offering $30 off the cost of ezAccounting 2015 business software has business owners rushing to test the innovative application,” said Dr. Ge, the founder of Halfpricesoft.com.
EzAccounting software is designed to cater to the needs of small to midsize business owners and entrepreneurs. This application is a stand alone software application therefore, no internet connection is needed. New customers can download and try this software with no obligation or cost at: http://accounting.halfpricesoft.com/accounting-software-download.asp
The software’s graphical interface guides customers step-by-step through setup.
Feature list include, but are not limited to the following:
Generates invoices, receipts, purchase orders
New password protection included at no additional charge
Tracks income and expenses
Generates estimates, invoices and receipts
Prints checks and tracks transactions
Manages purchase orders and bill paying
Processes payroll checks for employees
Prints tax forms 941, 940, W2 and W3
Generates multiple reports for sales, orders, payroll and other business reports
Supports multiple companies with one flat rate on the same machine
Free customer support for life of software
Network version available for multiple companies or computers in use
Check validation not required with stand alone applications
ezAccounting is priced at $149 per calendar year but is currently being offered at a limited time $30 off promotion. Customers seeking a way to simplify business operations are welcome to start the no obligation 30-day test drive today at:
http://accounting.halfpricesoft.com/accounting-software.asp
About Halfpricesoft.com
Founded in 2003, Halfpricesoft.com has established itself as a leader in meeting and exceeding the software requirements of small businesses around the world. Offering payroll software, accounting software, employee attendance tracking software, check writing/printing software, W2 software, 1099 software and ezACH deposit software. It continues to grow in the philosophy that small business owners deserve affordable, user friendly, and totally risk-free software.
